text: Hagi anante Jeremaia'a ru'ene mago avontafe erino avoma kreno erinte fatgoma nehia ne' Neria nemofo Barukuna nemino higeno, koma kre'nea avoma Juda kini ne' Jehoiakimi'ma tevefima kre'nea nanekeramina, ete Jeremaia'a nehigeno avontafepi krente'ne. Ana nehuno mago'ene ana agofetura rama'a anahukna nanekenena nehigeno krente'ne.
